section-1-council_outreach_key3: General Body Meeting ke minutes ko Good, Bad and Ugly format me ek public blog maintain karke uspar post karna. Ye blog har mahine NavGurukul ke main blog par bhi post kiya jayega.
section-1-council_outreach_key4: Alag alag activities ki pictures click karke unhe kisi centralized location par store karna jahan se sabhi member aur Board of Governors unhe access kar sake
section-1-council_outreach_key5: Center, volunteers aur community ke members ke commincation ka central point banna
section-1-council_outreach_key6: Ek center specific blog maintain karna
